title: 如何设置复活后的状态，血量，饥饿度。
author: 君莫笑CJ
txt_content: 1.12.2单机模式下，想设置复活后只有部分血量和饥饿，有MOD能达到也行。

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
褒

单次执行：
/scoreboard objectives add deathCount deathCount 死亡次数
/scoreboard objectives add time dummy

高频顺序执行：
scoreboard players tag @a add dying {Health:0f}
scoreboard players remove @a[tag=!dying,score_time_min=1] time 1
effect @a[score_time=0] minecraft:instant_damage 1 1 true
scoreboard players reset @a[score_time=0] time
scoreboard players set @a[score_deathCount_min=1] time 3
scoreboard players reset @a deathCount
scoreboard players tag @a remove dying

原理：玩家死亡复活后延迟 3 刻给予瞬间伤害Ⅱ（不然不会掉血）
